title: Bogdan & Sorin - Fitbit Development SDK and how to build rich apps focused on wellbeing

media:group.media:title: Bogdan & Sorin - Fitbit Development SDK and how to build rich apps focused on wellbeing
media:group.media:description:
Want to learn how to build wearable health apps that can reach millions of users? In this session, we’ll be covering how the Fitbit Development SDK works and how developers can build rich apps focused on health data and wellbeing. We’ll deep dive with a case study of one of the health apps that we offer to our users.

Bogdan Purcareata
Firmware engineer, TL for Fitbit Developer Platform SDK, interested and experienced in operating systems and development platforms. Motivated by software efficiency, robustness and elegance. Bodgan is located in Bucharest, Romania.

Sorin Ruse
Sorin works as TLM (Technical Lead Manager) at Fitbit, now part of Google. He has been focused on the quality of the FDP platform that they built for the last 4 years.


This talk is part of our DevFest Inspire event! #DevFestInspire

DevFest Inspire is a virtual event celebrating the end of the DevFest 2021 season where we’ll recognize content created by the community, as well as Googlers from Europe and Africa. 

You can also network and connect with other developers during the event! 
→ Learn more and sign up at https://goo.gle/devfest-inspire !
